DOC.brief_summary: This pilot trial test feasibility acceptability primary care-based intervention aim increase portion patient enter evidence-based behavioral weight loss treatment .
DOC.brief_title: Increasing Uptake Behavioral Weight Loss Programs Among Primary Care Patients
DOC.detailed_description: This trial pilot , pragmatic cluster randomize trial conduct primary care clinic determine intervention acceptability feasibility propose study protocol .
DOC.criteria: Primary care provider Inclusion criterion : Employed Duke PCRC clinic primary care provider least ½ FTE . Has primary adult panel Has work Duke PCRC clinic least one year Patient inclusion criterion BMI ≥ 30 kg/m2 measure clinic previous 12 month . English speak Selfreport BMI ≥ 29 kg/m2 ( allow underreporting ) Regular email usage , define access email 3 time per week ( home work computer cell phone ) Age 1875 Clinical appointment ( well visit chronic care visit ) enrol Duke provider 26 week record review . At least one prior appointment provider schedule see target clinical appt . Has valid email address electronic health record . Patient exclusion criterion : In weight loss treatment program past year Unable read content websites without assistance
